sentences.en: ‘I can manage on my own.’ ‘Please yourself.’.
sentences.cn: “我自己能行。”“随你便吧！”。

sentences.en: "Please understand this," she began, a tremble in her voice.
sentences.cn: “请理解这一点，”她开始说道，声音有些发颤。

sentences.en: a business that wants to please its customers
sentences.cn: 希望让顾客满意的一家公司

sentences.en: Bold as you please, she grabbed me by the sleeve.
sentences.cn: 她真够大胆的，竟抓住了我的衣袖。

sentences.en: Could you direct them to Dr Lamont's office, please?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉他们去拉蒙特医生的办公室怎么走吗？

sentences.en: Could you please clean up the living room?
sentences.cn: 你把起居室打扫一下好吗？

sentences.en: follow me, if you please.
sentences.cn: 烦请你跟我来。

sentences.en: For further information, please contact 414 3925, extension 2253.
For further information, please contact us on the attached form.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请使用所附表格联系我们。

sentences.en: Free gifts are dispatched separately so please allow 28 days for delivery.
sentences.cn: 赠品会分开发送，所以请预留28天的送货期。

sentences.en: I know this is an imposition. But please hear me out.
sentences.cn: 我知道这是强人所难。但是请听我说完。

sentences.en: I'd like to check the balance in my account please.
sentences.cn: 请查一下我的账户余额。

sentences.en: If you do want to go, please let me know.
sentences.cn: 如果你真想去的话就请告诉我。

sentences.en: Most children are eager to please .
sentences.cn: 大多数孩子都渴望取悦别人。

sentences.en: Please be quiet!
sentences.cn: 请安静！

sentences.en: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentences.cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentences.en: She adored her parents and would do anything to please them.
sentences.cn: 她很爱自己的父母，为让他们高兴愿意做任何事。

sentences.en: She did everything she could to please him.
sentences.cn: 她千方百计讨好他。

sentences.en: she walked forward as calm as you please.
sentences.cn: 她非常冷静地朝前走去。

sentences.en: she wants me to make fifty cakes in time for the festival, if you please!.
sentences.cn: 她竟然让我为这个节日赶做50个蛋糕。

sentences.en: Sit down, please.
sentences.cn: 请坐。

sentences.en: Why should I struggle on to please my parents?
sentences.cn: 为什么我要强装笑颜取悦我的父母？

sentences.en: Would you go and tie your horse up please.
sentences.cn: 能不能请你去把你的马拴好？

sentences.en: Would you shut up, please! I'm having enough trouble with these children!
sentences.cn: 请你闭嘴！这些孩子已经够我烦的了.

sentences.en: You will do as I request, if you please.
sentences.cn: 请按我的要求做。

words.tran_cn: 令人愉快的，舒适的；讨人喜欢的，和蔼可亲的
高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
令人愉快的；讨人喜欢的；合意的
快乐；希望；娱乐；令人高兴的事
满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)[用于强调某人做事的方式，尤指被认为是令人诧异的方式]非常
非常；格外；随便，随意，悉听尊便，随你喜欢
[用于表达对认为不合理事情的愤怒]竟然
请原谅我；请你谅解我吧
请稍候，请稍等；请您稍候；正在暖机等待结束再开始使用
[用于表示漠然，尤指当某人不按预计情况合作或行动时]随你便吧

trans.tran_en: to make someone happy or satisfied
used to be polite when asking someone to do something
used to be polite when asking someone to do something
to make someone happy or satisfied
